title: Football Heroes League
description: Football Heroes League is a high-octane multiplayer soccer game where superhuman abilities meet precise controls.
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1ud6h](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1ud6h.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Experience Soccer Like Never Before!**
<!--text-->
Football Heroes League is a high-octane multiplayer soccer game where superhuman abilities meet precise controls. A real person controls every player on the pitch, creating dynamic matches blending tactics with spectacular special moves. Master the intuitive third-person control system to aim shots, thread perfect passes, and unleash mind-blowing character abilities that defy physics. Team up with friends, show off your skills, and climb the ranks to become a legendary Soccer God!

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-6sus3](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-6sus3.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Experience soccer reimagined with astounding heroic abilities blended with strategic gameplay for high-stakes competitive matches.

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1q7b6](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1q7b6.png)

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-u0yg3](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-u0yg3.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
- Master the innovative aiming system to unleash perfect shots and passes
- Charge your kicks for devastating power plays
- Execute advanced moves like juggling, trapping, and precision dribbling
- Dominate with strategic steals and slide tackles

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1d2my](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1d2my.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Choose from a diverse roster of extraordinary characters, with more to come throughout Early Access:

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-avmyr](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-avmyr.png)

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1ibil](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1ibil.png)

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1pebj](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1pebj.png)

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1dmib](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1dmib.png)

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1mddw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1mddw.png)

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-vmc6x](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-vmc6x.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
- Team up with friends in dynamic online matches
- Unlock new characters and customize your look
- Climb from rookie divisions to legendary Soccer God status
- Enjoy skill-based matchmaking for perfectly balanced games
- Complete daily and weekly quests to earn rewards

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1gk13](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1gk13.png)

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1wpe4](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1wpe4.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
- Jump into 2v2, 3v3, or 5v5 matches
- Train against AI opponents
- Master abilities in a dedicated Training Mode
- Coming Soon: Instant Replay System to capture your greatest moments

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1mcut](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1mcut.gif)

<!--image-->
![Football Heroes League-1ghbj](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/704631b0c18b4c20985467ebce6f2729/football-heroes-league-1ghbj.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Join us in shaping the future of Football Heroes League! As an indie studio passionate about creating something extraordinary, we're excited to build this game alongside our community. Your feedback and support will help us deliver the competitive soccer experience of your dreams.
See you on the pitch!

- Run Games
